name: Extreme Cluster Truck Driving 3D
description:
Run for your life! Stop means death, so forget about it!
This place is crazed as you are!
Jump from roof to roof between trucks or your would end right now and right here!
Doesn’t matter the fact why you start this run, right now your main goal is running without stops!
Enjoy unusual running simulator with our new game - Extreme Cluster Truck Driving 3D! Feel like once ordinary trucker now running over the rooftops of motorcade trying to reach the first truck – it’s YOUR truck and someone has theft it!
As I said, this place is crazed – so, avoid these strange and unexpected obstacle like rolling logs, troll-hammers, tors of death and even laser beams – or I should call it “thermal rays of sudden death”? Do your best to evade such obstacles, jump, and duck – do your best to reach the end of this maddened racing track!
Join Extreme Cluster Truck Driving 3D – game, full of abnormal obstacles and even stranger things that you usually waiting from arcade runner! Have fun and run fast!
Extreme Cluster Truck Driving 3D features:
Very unusual truck roof runner
Strange and unusual obstacle
Different power-ups to help you run faster and longer
Strange scenario filled with mysteries and puzzles
Does this race mean something? Check it by yourself with Extreme Cluster Truck Driving 3D!
